Pre-Game Insights: This will be Canada's final tune-up before they take on Argentina at the Copa América
France took Argentina all the way to penalties at Qatar 2022 after winning the World Cup themselves in 2018
Canada's men’s team have played France just once before: in the group stage of the 1986 World Cup, where Jean-Pierre Papin scored the only goal
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Canadian men’s national team go from one massive European stage to another on Sunday
This match is also France coach Didier Deschamps’ final chance to evaluate his own team before they play at Euro 2024
Others: Expect to see some of the best players in the game take to the pitch
All but one of France’s players currently play for a team in Europe’s top five leagues
Tajon Buchanan is a teammate of Benjamin Pavard and Marcus Thuram at Inter

Among the questions for Marsch to consider is whether to make changes in his backline; if Derek Cornelius and Moïse Bombito are his preferred centre-back pairing, they’ll likely get the start together, unless Marsch wants to give someone like Kamal Miller a chance
Once again, there will be little margin for error for Canada against a French team that can punish even the strongest sides in the world with just one or two chances
